As of now, we have pretty much secured the ration for atleast 300 households Alhamdolillah, which will last for a month

It is a difficult terrain since we are trying to reach far flung areas in order to find the most poor (poverty is quite widespread, but we aim to extend the opportunity to the poorest of the poor, in sha Allah).

What is next:

  1. Get the support we have generated to Chitral
  2. Start engaging transpo to carry the ration to planned destinations

Side Note: Sometimes, the truck needs to get the ration offloaded on the main road as the pessage to the remote village is not commutable using large size vehicle; so our lead has to make arrangement with a smaller transportation to come to the main road and carry ration to the areas that can not be reached by a truck.

All this arrangement takes time, so bear with me.

as the details trickle down, i will keep you all updated in sha Allah

One more thing .. as per request from members of this group, We have requested the lead not to take videos/stills of recepients to preserve their dignity.

But where self-esteem is not compromised, We will share in pics when we can in sha Allah.
